titleStmt.title: The ansuuere made by the noble lords the States, vnto the ambassadour of Polonia
titleStmt.author: United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Geuaerts, dwelling in Lynbaeus Pat,
